Bishopric Interviews

If you need to renew your temple recommend and you meet the following criteria, then you can meet with one of the Bishopric counselors:
  1. 1) You've been attending our ward.
  2. 2) You're not getting married.
  3. 3) You're not getting endowed.
  4. 4) You've been in the ward at least a year or since the boundary change.
  5. 5) You don't need an Ecclesiastical/Employment Endorsement.
  6. 6) You have nothing you'd like to talk to Bishop about.

Nate Cloward -

(801) 227-9976

Steven Jensen -

(509) 598-5897

Otherwise, please schedule with the Bishop using the button below.

Bishop Roberts
